name: Minitroid (lozerd)
description:
Go forth as soap, the adventurous slime and explore a wacky planet full of strange creatures and cool powerups.

Controls:

arrow keys - move

z - jump

x - shoot

c - transform

r - restart

esc - quit

this game was developed by me (https://twitter.com/knee_destroyer)

and https://twitter.com/Mr__KitKat?s=20 for the revival jam
